title: Anton Kobyalko
text:
Anton Igorevich Kobyalko (; born 14 May 1986) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er. He plays for <a href="FC%20Tyumen">Tyumen</a>.
Club career.
Kobyalko made his professional debut in the <a href="Russian%20First%20Division">Russian First Division</a> in 2004 for <a href="FC%20Metallurg-Kuzbass%20Novokuznetsk">FC Metallurg-Kuzbass Novokuznetsk</a>.
On 20 July 2020, Kobyalko left <a href="FC%20Ararat-Armenia">Ararat-Armenia</a>. On 24 July, Kobyalko signed for <a href="FC%20Pyunik">FC Pyunik</a>.
Honours.
Club.
Ararat-Armenia
